# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

## Solution

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(str, ' ')
    result = ""
    for (i, word) in enumerate(words)
        if i == 1 || length(word) + length(result) < text_width
            result *= word * ' '
        else
            result *= '\n' * word * ' '
        end
    end
    return result[1:end - 1]  # Remove trailing space
end
```

## Example

```julia
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines") == "This function\nwill wrap\nwords into lines"
```
